授業目的:
The purpose of this course is for students to be able to write complete 
essays of varying degrees of complexity with outside sources integrated 
in accordance with proper academic citation standards.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:
1. plan and organize a highly sophisticated academic essay.
2. conduct and write a written report on an interview.
3. research information on a topic in the library and on the internet.
4. use outside information to support a written argument.
5. format a 2000-3000 word research essay using MLA or APA citation style.
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
授業方法: The class will be taught in a classroom, face-to-face format.

トピック.授業計画1: The class will focus on academic essay writing, including grammar, spelling and other writing activities.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to spend approximately 1 hour a week on homework.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: All materials will be supplied by the instructor.
